ComicInfo.Title: The Thunder God and the Troll!; The Tragedy of Hogun!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Thunder God and the Troll!: Geirrodur's trolls capture Sif and lure Thor after her. Thor must battle Ulik, mightiest of the Rock Trolls.
The Tragedy of Hogun!: Thor and his companions find the dying Saguta who is a countryman of Hogun's. Hogun swears vengeance on Mogul, lord of the Mystic Mountain, who did this.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:32:43. [Issue ID 20762]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Ulik (introduction),Thor [Donald Blake],Geirrodur, King of the Rock Trolls,Sif,Grak
